summary: Diff implements the new Crypto section (frontend route/page/components/hooks and backend state/migration), adds a persistent privacy status bar with secure/insecure styling, introduces a mobile-first Settings-style theme with toggle panels, adds SecurityNote messaging across sections, and adds empty-state SectionExamples across Tasks/Goals/Calendar/Budget/Crypto. One key uncertainty is whether backend Crypto CRUD methods are actually implemented, since the backend/main.mo diff is truncated before any crypto methods are shown. Some unrelated footer/social icon additions appear not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend support for per-user CRUD tracking for crypto entries (methods to create/list/update/delete entries scoped to the signed-in user).
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend hooks call actor.getCryptoPortfolio/createCryptoEntry/updateCryptoEntry/deleteCryptoEntry, but the backend/main.mo snippet shown only defines CryptoEntry type and cryptoPortfolios state; the required public methods are not present in the visible diff (file content is truncated).

hallucinated_features.description: Added social media icon imports (X/Facebook/Instagram) and footer/attribution-related UI elements not mentioned in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on theme refresh, security status bar, examples, crypto section, and loading regression; it does not request social links/icons or new footer marketing/attribution elements.
